description: Professional marketing website promoting the SFG Chrome Extension with AI-powered features, mobile notes, and app ecosystem integration. Built with Next.js 14, featuring authentication, partnership sections, and comprehensive feature showcase.
capabilities: Chrome Extension Promotion - Feature showcase and benefits
Mobile App Promotion - iPhone and Android notes app
App Ecosystem Dashboard - Third-party app integration requests
User Authentication - Email/password with NextAuth and Prisma
Contact Form - Lead generation and inquiries
Pricing Display - Subscription tiers and features
Version Management - Update tracking with changelog

workflows.name: User Registration Flow
workflows.description: New users sign up and access premium features

workflows.name: App Ecosystem Integration Request
workflows.description: Third-party developers request integration with SFG ecosystem

workflows.name: Lead Generation
workflows.description: Potential customers submit inquiries via contact form
